title: Changing Your Life, Against All Odds
description:
How can you be supportive when someone keeps lying to you? Plus, figuring out what's causing your back pain; and Jillian talks to a caller about the intricacies of treating food addiction.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
